CustomField.formula: IF (OR(Workflow_Trigger_Viewed_Final__c = FALSE, Workflow_Trigger_Viewed_Final__c = TRUE), HYPERLINK("/apex/SendEmail?id="&Id & "&action=Send_To_Other_Party_For_Review", IMAGE("/resource/Button_SendForReview", "Send For Review"), "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Send For Review
